We also ask that you complete our questionnaire so our pharmacy team can check that this product is suitable for you to buy. [](javascript:scrollToTop();) Here at Boots we are with you for life. You can rely on us to help you find everything on you and your little one's checklist. From bump to baby and toddlers to young children, we've got you covered, providing all baby health essentials from baby oral health to [children's medicine for cold and flu](https://www.boots.com/health-pharmacy/baby-child-health/child-cough-cold-flu). We endeavour to supply whatever you need to keep your family safe with ease, supporting you through every stage. Be prepared for anything that comes your way with and shop [children's paracetamol](https://www.boots.com/health-pharmacy/baby-child-health/fever-pain-relief), [children's hay fever medicine](https://www.boots.com/health-pharmacy/baby-child-health/allergy-hayfever-children) and more, in one place and at your fingertips. *The Private Winter Flu Jab Service is £9.95, for appointments booked online and in-store from Friday 23 December 2022 until Friday 31 March 2023. Excludes Jersey. Subject to availability. Eligibility criteria apply. Can be used in conjunction with quarterly mailer coupons and Student Discount members get 10% off. Some customers may be eligible for a free NHS flu jab, subject to eligibility. If you're eligible for the free NHS flu jab, it is available in most Boots pharmacies in England and Wales for customers aged 18+. Eligibility for a free NHS flu jab may be different in the Channel Islands, Isle of Man, Scotland and Northern Ireland. Speak to a member of our pharmacy team or see boots.com/flujab for more details.
